attributes.action: have a  re-think on the whole "old christmass playlist"  and encourage growth in our culture by giving something to people/buisness who an think outside the box for christmass parties! we need more fun!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm sick of the same old songs at christmass, and isn't everybody tired of the same stagnant christmass parties? Initiate policy to encourage growth in our culture and fun! by giving tax reductions to buisness (or something) who are encouraging new acts at christmass parties! Do we need to hear Waterloo by ABBA one more time?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
